fifth.heading: 100% customizable
fifth.text: You can customize your storefront and everything else in the way you want as the owner of your source code.

first.heading: One time payment
first.text: Check out our best practices and support to quickly make text messaging one of your top 3 revenue channels.

fourth.heading: Mobile first design
fourth.text: With our mobile app, you can allow your customers to check their order status, browse your store and create an account on the spot.

second.heading: Self-reported data
second.text: You own your data, store design and business plan, but you are free to use the software platform and resources provided by Sirmyt.

sixth.heading: One time payment
sixth.text: You can have peace of mind knowing that your system is running smoothly thanks to our techs' expertise and precision.

third.heading: Updates are always free.
third.text: Sirmyt is so dedicated to keeping its software current that it sends you free updates for a lifetime without charging you anything.
